tutorial_start.title: Tutorial: Walkabout
tutorial_start.body: Beneath the endless ochre sky of the Australian Outback, our astronauts begin their survival training mission. The landscape stretches in every direction... harsh, beautiful, and unforgiving. Dust clings to their suits, the sun blazes overhead, and every step is a lesson in resourcefulness and resilience. The team adjusts their packs, checks their instruments, and begins their journey into the red wilderness.
